Package mahjongCIS350

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • mahjongCIS350.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents each individual player. Each player will have a hand and a setpile where sets are moved to when claimed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player()
      This is a constructor that instantiates the hand, setpile , and the direction of the player as well as set the point total to 0.
      Player​(java.lang.String direction)
      This is a constructor that instantiates the hand, setpile , but sets direction of the player based on the parameter direction, as well as set the point total to 0.

      This method gets the number of points the player has.
